projectDesc.p: SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts aims to establish a corpus of Indic texts marked up according to the guidelines of the Text Encoding Initiative (TEI).

encodingDesc.p: The published edition from which this e-text was originally transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Orthography follows general transliteration principles in roman script, thus words are separated whenever possible such as "tac ca", "ity eva".
Vowel merging has not been reverted, e.g. "asyaiva", "ceti".
Members of compounds are separated by hyphens except the cases of vowel merging.

refsDecl.p: References to each portion of the Sanskrit text have been placed at the start of each line as xml:id attributes to the XML line tag: e.g., xml:id="Ah.1.9.019a" refers to Das and Emmerick's edition of the Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṃhitā, Part 1, Chapter 9, Verse 19, Line 1.
Part and Chapter headings are from Kuṇṭe, Aṇṇā Moreśvara and Navare, Kṛṣṇaśāstrī.
Page references have been placed in the body of the text at ten verse intervals: e.g., -- 6 -- refers to the SARIT transcript, page 6.
Page references to Kuṇṭe and Navare's edition of the Sanskrit text are given in a note: e.g., K edn 12-18 refers to Kuṇṭe and Navare's 1902 edition, pages 12 to 18.

Page references to Vogel's edition and English translation of the Tibetan and Sanskrit text have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., V edn & tr. 82-120 refers to Vogel's 1965 edition and translation, pages 82 to 120.

encodingDesc.p:
Anusvāra is transliterated by:
ṅ before gutturals
ñ before palatals
ṇ before cerebrals
n before dentals
m before labials
Members of a compound are separated by periods.
The base e-text was typed, analyzed and proofread by R. P. Das and R. E. Emmerick.

lg.l: te 'gniveśādikāṃs te tu pṛthak tantrāṇi tenire |
aṣṭāv aṅgāni tasyāhuś cikitsā yeṣu saṃśritā |
vāyuḥ pittaṃ kaphaś ceti trayo doṣāḥ samāsataḥ || 6 ||
vikṛtā-vikṛtā dehaṃ ghnanti te vartayanti ca |
te vyāpino 'pi hṛn-nābhyor adho-madhyordhva-saṃśrayāḥ || 7 || Ah.1.1.007v/ 1-7bv ghnanti te vardhayanti ca
tair bhaved viṣamas tīkṣṇo mandaś cāgniḥ samaiḥ samaḥ || 8 ||
koṣṭhaḥ krūro mṛdur madhyo madhyaḥ syāt taiḥ samair api |
taiś ca tisraḥ prakṛtayo hīna-madhyottamāḥ pṛthak |
sama-dhātuḥ samastāsu śreṣṭhā nindyā dvi-doṣa-jāḥ || 10 || Ah.1.1.010v/ 1-10cv sama-dhātuḥ samais tāsu
tatra rūkṣo laghuḥ śītaḥ kharaḥ sūkṣmaś calo 'nilaḥ |
pittaṃ sa-sneha-tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ laghu visraṃ saraṃ dravam || 11 ||
snigdhaḥ śīto gurur mandaḥ ślakṣṇo mṛtsnaḥ sthiraḥ kaphaḥ |
ṣaḍ dravyam āśritās te ca yathā-pūrvaṃ balāvahāḥ |
tatrādyā mārutaṃ ghnanti trayas tiktādayaḥ kapham || 15 ||
śamanaṃ kopanaṃ svastha-hitaṃ dravyam iti tri-dhā || 16 ||
rajas tamaś ca manaso dvau ca doṣāv udāhṛtau || 21 || Ah.1.1.021v/ 1-21dv 'tra dvau doṣāv udāhṛtau
rogaṃ nidāna-prāg-rūpa-lakṣaṇopaśayāptibhiḥ || 22 || Ah.1.1.022v/ 1-22bv samparīkṣeta rogiṇam 1-22bv parīkṣetātha rogiṇam
śodhanaṃ śamanaṃ ceti samāsād auṣadhaṃ dvi-dhā |
vastir vireko vamanaṃ tathā tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu |
āḍhyo rogī bhiṣag-vaśyo jñāpakaḥ sat-tva-vān api || 29 ||
sādhyo '-sādhya iti vyādhir dvi-dhā tau tu punar dvi-dhā |
su-sādhyaḥ kṛcchra-sādhyaś ca yāpyo yaś cān-upakramaḥ || 29+(1) ||
śastrādi-sādhanaḥ kṛcchraḥ saṅkare ca tato gadaḥ |
tyajed ārtaṃ bhiṣag-bhūpair dviṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ dviṣaṃ dviṣam |
sirā-vidhiḥ śalya-vidhiḥ śastra-kṣārāgni-karmikau || 38 || Ah.1.1.038v/ 1-38cv sirā-vyadhaḥ śalya-vidhiḥ
cikitsitaṃ jvare rakte kāse śvāse ca yakṣmaṇi |
vamau madātyaye 'rśaḥsu viṣi dvau dvau ca mūtrite || 42 ||
bālopacāre tad-vyādhau tad-grahe dvau ca bhūta-ge || 45 ||
unmāde 'tha smṛti-bhraṃśe dvau dvau vartmasu sandhiṣu |
dṛk-tamo-liṅga-nāśeṣu trayo dvau dvau ca sarva-ge || 46 ||
catvāriṃśo 'n-apatyānām adhyāyo bīja-poṣaṇaḥ || 48 || Ah.1.1.048v/ 1-48dv adhyāyo bīja-poṣaṇe
ity adhyāya-śataṃ viṃśaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ sthānair udīritam || 48ū̆ ||
brāhme muhūrta uttiṣṭhet svastho rakṣārtham āyuṣaḥ |
bhakṣayed danta-pavanaṃ danta-māṃsāny a-bādhayan || 3 || Ah.1.2.003v/ 2-3cv bhakṣayed danta-dhavanaṃ
sauvīram añjanaṃ nityaṃ hitam akṣṇos tato bhajet |
cakṣus tejo-mayaṃ tasya viśeṣāc chleṣmato bhayam || 5 || Ah.1.2.005v/ 2-5dv viśeṣāc chleṣmaṇo bhayam
rātrau jāgaritaś cāpi nāñjyāj jvarita eva ca || 5-1+1 ||
tato nāvana-gaṇḍūṣa-dhūma-tāmbūla-bhāg bhavet || 6 || Ah.1.2.006v/ 2-6bv srāvaṇārthe rasāñjanam
vāta-pittāmayī bālo vṛddho '-jīrṇo ca taṃ tyajet |
śīta-kāle vasante ca mandam eva tato 'nya-dā |
taṃ kṛtvānu-sukhaṃ dehaṃ mardayec ca samantataḥ || 12 ||
tṛṣṇā kṣayaḥ pratamako rakta-pittaṃ śramaḥ klamaḥ |
ati-vyāyāmataḥ kāso jvaraś chardiś ca jāyate || 13 ||
gajaṃ siṃha ivākarṣan bhajann ati vinaśyati || 14 || Ah.1.2.014v/ 2-14dv bhajan yato 'ti naśyati
tenaiva tūttamāṅgasya bala-hṛt-keśa-cakṣuṣām || 17 || Ah.1.2.017v/ 2-17cv tenaiva cottamāṅgasya 2-17cv sa eva cottamāṅgasya 2-17cv sa eva tūttamāṅgasya
jīrṇe hitaṃ mitaṃ cādyān na vegān īrayed balāt |
na vegito 'nya-kāryaḥ syān nā-jitvā sādhyam āmayam || 19 ||
sukhaṃ ca na vinā dharmāt tasmād dharma-paro bhavet || 20 ||
sampad-vipatsv eka-manā hetāv īrṣyet phale na tu || 25 ||
kāle hitaṃ mitaṃ brūyād a-visaṃvādi peśalam |
naikaḥ sukhī na sarva-tra viśrabdho na ca śaṅkitaḥ |
na kañ-cid ātmanaḥ śatruṃ nātmānaṃ kasya-cid ripum || 27 ||
prakāśayen nāpamānaṃ na ca niḥ-sneha-tāṃ prabhoḥ |
janasyāśayam ālakṣya yo yathā parituṣyati || 28 || Ah.1.2.028v/ 2-28av prakāśayen nāvamānaṃ
na pīḍayed indriyāṇi na caitāny ati lālayet || 29 ||
snāna-śīlaḥ su-surabhiḥ su-veṣo 'n-ulbaṇojjvalaḥ || 31 || Ah.1.2.031v/ 2-31cv snāna-śīlaḥ sa-surabhiḥ
niśi cātyayike kārye daṇḍī maulī sahāya-vān |
nadīṃ taren na bāhubhyāṃ nāgni-skandham abhivrajet || 34 ||
nā-saṃvṛta-mukhaḥ kuryāt kṣuti-hāsya-vijṛmbhaṇam || 35 || Ah.1.2.035v/ 2-35dv kṣutiṃ hāsyaṃ vijṛmbhaṇam 2-35dv kṣut-hāsyaṃ ca vijṛmbhaṇam
nāsikāṃ na vikuṣṇīyān nā-kasmād vilikhed bhuvam |
nāṅgaiś ceṣṭeta vi-guṇaṃ nāsītotkaṭakaś ciram || 36 || Ah.1.2.036v/ 2-36bv nā-kasmād vilikhen mahīm 2-36dv nāsītotkaṭaka-sthitaḥ
nordhva-jānuś ciraṃ tiṣṭhen naktaṃ seveta na drumam || 37 ||
rajasvalāṃ ca nekṣeta sadā prātar a-maṅgalam || 38+1 ||
sarva-thekṣeta nādityaṃ na bhāraṃ śirasā vahet |
ācāryaḥ sarva-ceṣṭāsu loka eva hi dhī-mataḥ |
duḥkha-bhāṅ na bhavaty evaṃ nityaṃ sannihita-smṛtiḥ || 47 ||
evaṃ kṛtsna-dinaṃ nītvā rātrau yāme gṛhe gate |
devān ṛṣīn gurūn smṛtvā tataḥ śayanam ācaret || 47+1 || Ah.1.2.047+1v/ 2-47+1bv rātrer yāme gate sati
ity ācāraḥ samāsena yaṃ prāpnoti samācaran |
āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ yaśo lokāṃś ca śāśvatān || 48 ||
māsair dvi-saṅkhyair māghādyaiḥ kramāt ṣaḍ ṛtavaḥ smṛtāḥ |
śiśirādyās tribhis tais tu vidyād ayanam uttaram |
ādānaṃ ca tad ādatte nṛṇāṃ prati-dinaṃ balam || 2 ||
tiktaḥ kaṣāyaḥ kaṭuko balino 'tra rasāḥ kramāt |
varṣādayo visargaś ca yad balaṃ visṛjaty ayam |
saumya-tvād atra somo hi bala-vān hīyate raviḥ || 5 ||
śīte 'gryaṃ vṛṣṭi-gharme 'lpaṃ balaṃ madhyaṃ tu śeṣayoḥ |
bhavaty alpendhano dhātūn sa paced vāyuneritaḥ |
dairghyān niśānām etarhi prātar eva bubhukṣitaḥ |
niyuddhaṃ kuśalaiḥ sārdhaṃ pādāghātaṃ ca yuktitaḥ || 10 || Ah.1.3.010v/ 3-10bv mūrdha-tailaṃ vimardanam
rasān snigdhān palaṃ puṣṭaṃ gauḍam accha-surāṃ surām |
navam annaṃ vasāṃ tailaṃ śauca-kārye sukhodakam |
ayam eva vidhiḥ kāryaḥ śiśire 'pi viśeṣataḥ |
tadā hi śītam adhikaṃ raukṣyaṃ cādāna-kāla-jam || 17 ||
hatvāgniṃ kurute rogān atas taṃ tvarayā tyajet || 18 ||
dakṣiṇānila-śīteṣu parito jala-vāhiṣu || 23 || Ah.1.3.023v/ 3-23bv madhv-ambu jaladāmbu vā
tīkṣṇāṃśur ati-tīkṣṇāṃśur grīṣme saṅkṣipatīva yat || 26 || Ah.1.3.026v/ 3-26cv sneham arko 'ti-tīkṣṇāṃśur
praty-ahaṃ kṣīyate śleṣmā tena vāyuś ca vardhate |
bhajen madhuram evānnaṃ laghu snigdhaṃ himaṃ dravam |
madyaṃ na peyaṃ peyaṃ vā sv-alpaṃ su-bahu-vāri vā |
anya-thā śoṣa-śaithilya-dāha-mohān karoti tat || 29 || Ah.1.3.029v/ 3-29cv anya-thā śopha-śaithilya-
pibed rasaṃ nāti-ghanaṃ rasālāṃ rāga-khāṇḍavau || 30 || Ah.1.3.030v/ 3-30av kundendu-dhavalāñ chālīn 3-30dv rasālāṃ rāga-khāḍavau 3-30dv rasālāṃ rāga-ṣāḍavau
moca-coca-dalair yuktaṃ sāmlaṃ mṛn-maya-śuktibhiḥ || 31 || Ah.1.3.031v/ 3-31bv nava-mṛd-bhājana-sthitam
jaṅgamā iva padminyo haranti dayitāḥ klamam || 41 ||
varṣāsu doṣair duṣyanti te 'mbu-lambāmbu-de 'mbare || 42 || Ah.1.3.042v/ 3-42av ādāna-mlāna-vapuṣām
vahninaiva ca mandena teṣv ity anyo-'nya-dūṣiṣu |
bhajet sādhāraṇaṃ sarvam ūṣmaṇas tejanaṃ ca yat || 44 ||
āsthāpanaṃ śuddha-tanur jīrṇaṃ dhānyaṃ rasān kṛtān |
divyaṃ kaupaṃ śṛtaṃ cāmbho bhojanaṃ tv ati-dur-dine || 46 || Ah.1.3.046v/ 3-46av mastu sauvarcalāḍhyaṃ ca
taptānāṃ sañcitaṃ vṛṣṭau pittaṃ śaradi kupyati || 49 ||
tiktaṃ svādu kaṣāyaṃ ca kṣudhito 'nnaṃ bhajel laghu || 50 ||
śuci haṃsodakaṃ nāma nir-malaṃ mala-jij jalam || 52 ||
nābhiṣyandi na vā rūkṣaṃ pānādiṣv amṛtopamam |
śīte varṣāsu cādyāṃs trīn vasante 'ntyān rasān bhajet || 55 ||
tatra pūrvo vidhis tyājyaḥ sevanīyo 'paraḥ kramāt || 58 || Ah.1.3.058v/ 3-58av ṛtvor antyādi-saptāhād
a-sātmya-jā hi rogāḥ syuḥ sahasā tyāga-śīlanāt || 58ū̆ ||
ūrdhva-vāyuḥ parīkarto hṛdayasyoparodhanam || 3 || Ah.1.4.003v/ 4-3cv ūrdhvaṃ vāyuḥ parīkarto
mukhena viṭ-pravṛttiś ca pūrvoktāś cāmayāḥ smṛtāḥ |
mūtrasya rodhāt pūrve ca prāyo rogās tad-auṣadham |
mūtra-jeṣu tu pāne ca prāg-bhaktaṃ śasyate ghṛtam || 6 || Ah.1.4.006v/ 4-6cv mūtra-jeṣu ca pānaṃ tu 4-6cv mūtra-jeṣu prayuñjīta 4-6dv sarpiṣaś cāvapīḍakam
avapīḍakam etac ca sañjñitaṃ dhāraṇāt punaḥ || 7 ||
pravartayet kṣutiṃ saktāṃ sneha-svedau ca śīlayet |
tṛṣṇāyā nigrahāt tatra śītaḥ sarvo vidhir hitaḥ |
tatra yojyaṃ laghu snigdham uṣṇam alpaṃ ca bhojanam |
nidrāyā moha-mūrdhākṣi-gauravālasya-jṛmbhikāḥ || 12 || Ah.1.4.012v/ 4-12av vaivarṇyaṃ ca kṣudhas tatra 4-12bv snigdhoṣṇaṃ laghu bhojanam
aṅga-mardaś ca tatreṣṭaḥ svapnaḥ saṃvāhanāni ca |
śoṣo hidhmā ca kāryo 'tra kāsa-hā su-tarāṃ vidhiḥ |
hitaṃ viśramaṇaṃ tatra vāta-ghnaś ca kriyā-kramaḥ |
jṛmbhāyāḥ kṣava-vad rogāḥ sarvaś cānila-jid vidhiḥ || 15 || Ah.1.4.015v/ 4-15cc jṛmbhāyāḥ kṣuti-vad rogāḥ
sa-gulmā bāṣpatas tatra svapno madyaṃ priyāḥ kathāḥ || 16 ||
vyāyāmaḥ srutir asrasya śastaṃ cātra virecanam || 18 || Ah.1.4.018v/ 4-18av gaṇḍūṣa-dhūmān-āhāraṃ 4-18av gaṇḍūṣa-dhūmān-āhārān 4-18bv rūkṣaṃ bhuktvā tad udvamet 4-18bv rūkṣān bhuktvā tad udvamet
śukrāt tat-sravaṇaṃ guhya-vedanā-śvayathu-jvarāḥ || 19 || Ah.1.4.019v/ 4-19bv abhyaṅgārthe ca śasyate
vasti-śuddhi-karaiḥ siddhaṃ bhajet kṣīraṃ priyāḥ striyaḥ |
nirdiṣṭaṃ sādhanaṃ tatra bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye tu tān prati || 22 ||
tataś cāneka-dhā prāyaḥ pavano yat prakupyati |
dhārayet tu sadā vegān hitaiṣī pretya ceha ca |
yateta ca yathā-kālaṃ malānāṃ śodhanaṃ prati |
aty-artha-sañcitās te hi kruddhāḥ syur jīvita-cchidaḥ || 25 ||
ye tu saṃśodhanaiḥ śuddhā na teṣāṃ punar-udbhavaḥ || 26 || Ah.1.4.026v/ 4-26cv ye tu saṃśodhanaiḥ śuddhās 4-26dv teṣāṃ na punar-udbhavaḥca
rasāyanāni siddhāni vṛṣya-yogāṃś ca kāla-vit || 27 || Ah.1.4.027v/ 4-27av yathā-kramaṃ yathā-yogyam
rāga-dveṣa-bhayādyāś ca te syur āgantavo gadāḥ || 31 || Ah.1.4.031v/ 4-31cv kāma-krodha-bhāyādyāś
nijāgantu-vikārāṇām utpannānāṃ ca śāntaye || 34 || Ah.1.4.034v/ 4-34av an-utpattau samāsena
śītodbhavaṃ doṣa-cayaṃ vasante viśodhayan grīṣma-jam abhra-kāle |
ghanātyaye vārṣikam āśu samyak prāpnoti rogān ṛtu-jān na jātu || 35 ||
dātā samaḥ satya-paraḥ kṣamā-vān āptopasevī ca bhavaty a-rogaḥ || 36 ||
tanv a-vyakta-rasaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ śītaṃ laghv amṛtopamam || 1 ||
gaṅgāmbu nabhaso bhraṣṭaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ tv arkendu-mārutaiḥ |
a-klinnam a-vi-varṇaṃ ca tat peyaṃ gāṅgam anya-thā || 3 || Ah.1.5.003v/ 5-3bv śāly-annaṃ rājata-sthitam 5-3cv a-klinnam a-vi-varṇaṃ syāt 5-3cv a-klinnam a-vivarṇaṃ vā 5-3dv tat toyaṃ gāṅgam anya-thā
sāmudraṃ tan na pātavyaṃ māsād āśvayujād vinā |
aindram ambu su-pātra-stham a-vipannaṃ sadā pibet || 4 ||

vidadhyāt teṣu teṣv eva kośam aṅguli-parvasu |

goṣ-phaṇaṃ sandhiṣu tathā yamakaṃ yamike vraṇe |
samaṃ mehana-muṣke ca netre sandhiṣu ca ślatham |
gāḍham eva sama-sthāne bhṛśaṃ gāḍhaṃ tad-āśaye |

payo vāta-haraiḥ siddhaṃ daśāhaṃ bhojane hitam |

kramāt saptasu māseṣu garbhe sravati yojayet |

yojayed daśame māsi siddhaṃ kṣīraṃ payasyayā |
avasthitaṃ lohitam aṅganāyā vātena garbhaṃ bruvate 'n-abhijñāḥ |

vastīn na bṛṃhaṇīyān dadyād vyādhiṣu viśodhanīyeṣu |
medasvino viśodhyā ye ca narāḥ kuṣṭha-mehārtāḥ || 72 || Ah.5.4.072v/ 4-72bv dadyād vyādhiṣu ca śodhanīyeṣu

vastiḥ saṅkṣobhya taṃ doṣaṃ dur-bala-tvād a-nirharan |

phala-vartyas tathā svedāḥ kālaṃ jñātvā virecanam |
yukto 'lpa-vīryo doṣāḍhye rūkṣe krūrāśaye 'tha-vā || 6 || Ah.5.5.006v/ 5-6av surādi-māṃs tatra vastiḥ

vyajed ā-klama-nāśāc ca prāṇāyāmaṃ ca kārayet |
pṛṣṭha-pārśvodaraṃ mṛjyāt karair uṣṇair adho-mukham || 13 || Ah.5.5.013v/ 5-13av vījet klama-vināśāc ca 5-13av vījed ā-klama-nāśāc ca 5-13av vījyed ā-klama-nāśāc ca 5-13cv pṛṣṭha-pārśvodaraṃ mṛdyāt
śastrolkā-rāja-puruṣair vastir eti tathā hy adhaḥ || 14 || Ah.5.5.014v/ 5-14bv bhāyayed vyāla-daṃṣṭribhiḥv 5-14bv bhāpayed vyāla-daṃṣṭribhiḥ

bhuñjīta yūṣair payasā rasair vā dhanva-cāriṇām || 123 ||
madyam ekaṃ pibet tatra tṛṭ-prabandhe jalānvitam |

a-madya-pas tv āranālaṃ phalāmbu parisikthakām || 124 || Ah.6.39.124v/ 39-124av madyam ekaṃ pibet tv atra 39-124bv tṛṭ-[pra]vṛddhe jalānvitam 39-124bv tṛḍ-vibandhe jalānvitam 39-124dv phalāmbu parisikthikām 39-124dv phalāmbu parisitthikām 39-124dv phalāmbu parisikthikam 39-124dv phalāmbu-pariṣecitam
sthitaṃ daśāhād aśnīyāt tad-vad vā vasayā samam || 125 || Ah.6.39.125v/ 39-125dv tad-vad vā payasā samam
nimardakān vā ghṛta-śukta-yuktān pra-kāmam adyāl laghu tuccham aśnan || 126 || Ah.6.39.126v/ 39-126cv vimardakān vā ghṛta-śukta-yuktān 39-126dv pra-kāmam adyāl laghu tuttham aśnan
śuddhe vā vidyate vāyau na dravyaṃ laśunāt param || 127 || Ah.6.39.127v/ 39-127av pitta-rakta-vinirmukte 39-127bv samastāvaraṇāvṛte
a-titikṣor a-jīrṇaṃ ca laśuno vyāpade dhruvam || 128 || Ah.6.39.128v/ 39-128bv māṃsa-madyādi-vidviṣaḥ 39-128cv a-tityakṣor a-jīrṇam ca 39-128cv ati-rūkṣair a-jīrṇe ca
sarvaṃ ca tikta-kaṭukaṃ nāty-uṣṇaṃ kaṭu pākataḥ |
chedanaṃ ca viśeṣeṇa lauhaṃ tatra praśasyate || 131 ||
snigdham an-amla-kaṣāyaṃ mṛdu guru ca śilā-jatu śreṣṭham || 132 ||
prāk kevala-jala-dhautaṃ śuṣkaṃ kvāthais tato bhāvyam || 133 ||
tat sama-rasa-tāṃ yātaṃ saṃśuṣkaṃ prakṣiped rase bhūyaḥ |
svaiḥ svair evaṃ kvāthair bhāvyaṃ vārān bhavet sapta || 135 ||
try-ahaṃ yuñjīta girijam ekaikena tathā try-aham || 136 || Ah.6.39.136v/ 39-136av atha snigdha-viśuddhasya
yogaṃ yogyaṃ tatas tasya kālāpekṣaṃ prayojayet || 137 || Ah.6.39.137v/ 39-137cv yoga-yogyaṃ tatas tasya 39-137cv yoge yojyaṃ tatas tasya 39-137dv kālāpekṣaṃ tu yojayet
guṇān samagrān kurute sahasā vyāpadaṃ na ca || 138 ||
kulatthān kākamācīṃ ca kapotāṃś ca sadā tyajet || 141 ||
na so 'sti rogo bhuvi sādhya-rūpo jatv aśma-jaṃ yaṃ na jayet prasahya |
tat-kāla-yogair vidhi-vat prayuktaṃ svasthasya corjāṃ vipulāṃ dadhāti || 142 || Ah.6.39.142v/ 39-142bv jatv aśma-jaṃ yaṃ na haret prasahya 39-142dv svasthasya corjāṃ vipulāṃ dadāti
ato 'nya-thā tu ye teṣāṃ saurya-mārutiko vidhiḥ || 143 || Ah.6.39.143v/ 39-143av kuṭī-praveśaḥ kṣamiṇāṃ 39-143av kuṭī-praveśaḥ kṣīṇānāṃ 39-143dv sūrya-mārutiko vidhiḥ
sukhopacārā bhraṃśe 'pi ye na dehasya bādhakāḥ || 144 ||
śītodakaṃ payaḥ kṣaudraṃ ghṛtam ekaika-śo dvi-śaḥ |
tri-śaḥ samastam atha-vā prāk pītaṃ sthāpayed vayaḥ || 145 ||
guḍena madhunā śuṇṭhyā kṛṣṇayā lavaṇena vā |
dve dve khādan sadā pathye jīved varṣa-śataṃ sukhī || 146 ||
harītakīṃ sarpiṣi sampratāpya samaśnatas tat pibato ghṛtaṃ ca |

bhavec cira-sthāyi balaṃ śarīre sakṛt kṛtaṃ sādhu yathā kṛta-jñe || 147 || Ah.6.39.147v/ 39-147bv samaśnute cet pibato ghṛtaṃ ca 39-147cv bhavec cira-sthāyi-balaṃ śarīraṃ 39-147dv sakṛt kṛtaṃ sādhu yathā kṛta-jñāḥ
praṇāśam āyānti jarā-vikārā granthā viśālā iva dur-gṛhītāḥ || 148 || Ah.6.39.148v/ 39-148bv hitāśināṃ vai lihatāṃ narāṇām
niṣevamāṇasya bhaven narasya tāruṇya-lāvaṇyam a-vipraṇaṣṭam || 149 || Ah.6.39.149v/ 39-149dv tāruṇya-lāvaṇyam ati-pratiṣṭham 39-149dv tāruṇya-lāvaṇyam api praṇaṣṭam
lauhaṃ rajo vella-bhavaṃ ca sarpiḥ-kṣaudra-drutaṃ sthāpitam abda-mātram |

samudgake bījaka-sāra-k pte lihan balī jīvati kṛṣṇa-keśaḥ || 150 || Ah.6.39.150v/ 39-150av lohaṃ rajo vella-bhavaṃ ca sarpiḥ- 39-150av lohād rajo vella-bhavaṃ ca sarpiḥ- 39-150cv samudgake bījaka-sāra-lipte 39-150cv sāmudgake bījaka-kṣāra-k pte
jarā-nadīṃ roga-taraṅgiṇīṃ te lāvaṇya-yuktāḥ puruṣās taranti || 151 ||
niyamena narā niṣevitāro yadi jīvanty a-rujaḥ kim atra citram || 152 || Ah.6.39.152v/ 39-152bv tri-phalāyā ghṛta-mākṣikānvitāyāḥ 39-152dv yadi jīvanty a-jarāḥ kim atra citram
bījakasya rasam aṅguli-hāryaṃ śarkarāṃ madhu ghṛtaṃ tri-phalāṃ ca |
śīlayatsu puruṣeṣu jarat-tā sv-āgatāpi vinivartata eva || 153 || Ah.6.39.153v/ 39-153bv śarkarā-madhu-ghṛtaṃ tri-phalāṃ ca 39-153bv śarkarā-madhu-yutaṃ tri-phalāṃ ca
punarnavasyārdha-palaṃ navasya piṣṭaṃ pibed yaḥ payasārdha-māsam |
māsa-dvayaṃ tat-tri-guṇaṃ samāṃ vā jīrṇo 'pi bhūyaḥ sa punar-navaḥ syāt || 154 ||
tāñ jīvitādhvānam abhiprapannān na vipralumpanti vikāra-caurāḥ || 156 ||
pītāśvagandhā payasārdha-māsaṃ ghṛtena tailena sukhāmbunā vā |
kṛśasya puṣṭiṃ vapuṣo vidhatte bālasya sasyasya yathā su-vṛṣṭiḥ || 157 || Ah.6.39.157v/ 39-157bv ghṛtena tailena su-sūkṣma-piṣṭā 39-157dv bālasya vṛkṣasya yathāmbu-vṛṣṭiḥ
poṣaḥ śarīrasya bhavaty an-alpo dṛḍhī-bhavanty ā-maraṇāc ca dantāḥ || 158 || Ah.6.39.158v/ 39-158bv samaśnataḥ śīta-jalānu-pānam
vṛṣaḥ sthiraḥ śānta-vikāra-duḥkhaḥ samāḥ śataṃ jīvati kṛṣṇa-keśaḥ || 159 || Ah.6.39.159v/ 39-159bv lihan sa-sarpir madhunā prayuktam 39-159bv lihan sa-sarpir madhu-bhāga-yuktam
sārdhaṃ tilair āmalakāni kṛṣṇair akṣāṇi saṅkṣudya harītakīr vā |
ye 'dyur mayūrā iva te manuṣyā ramyaṃ parīṇāmam avāpnuvanti || 160 ||
ye māsam ekaṃ sva-rasaṃ pibanti dine dine bhṛṅgarajaḥ-samuttham |
kṣīrāśinas te bala-vīrya-yuktāḥ samāḥ śataṃ jīvitam āpnuvanti || 162 || Ah.6.39.162v/ 39-162dv samā-śataṃ jīvitam āpnuvanti
māsaṃ vacām apy upasevamānāḥ kṣīreṇa tailena ghṛtena vāpi |
maṇḍūkaparṇīm api bhakṣayanto bhṛṣṭāṃ ghṛte māsam an-anna-bhakṣāḥ |
jīvanti kālaṃ vipulaṃ pragalbhās tāruṇya-lāvaṇya-guṇodaya-sthāḥ || 164 || Ah.6.39.164v/ 39-164av maṇḍūkaparṇīṃ paribhakṣayanto 39-164bv bhṛṣṭāṃ ghṛte māsam an-anna-bhakṣyāḥ

mārkava-sva-rase ṣaṣṭyā guṭikānāṃ śata-trayam || 165 || Ah.6.39.165v/ 39-165bv -pala-pañcāśataḥ kṛtāt 39-165bv -pala-pañcāśatī-kṛtam 39-165cv mārkava-sva-rase piṣṭād 39-165cv mārkava-sva-rase piṣṭvā 39-165dv guṭikānāṃ śata-trayāt
chāyā-viśuṣkaṃ guṭikārdham adyāt pūrvaṃ samastām api tāṃ krameṇa |
bhajed viriktaḥ krama-śaś ca maṇḍaṃ peyāṃ vilepīṃ rasakaudanaṃ ca || 166 || Ah.6.39.166v/ 39-166av chāyā-viśuṣkād guṭikārdham adyāt
sarpiḥ-snigdhaṃ māsam ekaṃ yatātmā māsād ūrdhvaṃ sarva-thā svaira-vṛttiḥ |
varjyaṃ yatnāt sarva-kālaṃ tv a-jīrṇaṃ varṣeṇaivaṃ yogam evopayuñjyāt || 167 || Ah.6.39.167v/ 39-167bv māsād ūrdhvaṃ sarva-śaḥ svaira-vṛttiḥ 39-167dv varṣeṇaivaṃ yogam evopayuñjya
bhavati vigata-rogo yo 'py a-sādhyāmayārtaḥ prabala-puruṣa-kāraḥ śobhate yo 'pi vṛddhaḥ |
upacita-pṛthu-gātra-śrotra-netrādi-yuktas taruṇa iva samānāṃ pañca jīvec chatāni || 168 ||
pātre loha-maye try-ahaṃ ravi-karair āloḍayan pācayed || 169c ||

agnau cānu mṛdau sa-loha-śakalaṃ pāda-sthitaṃ tat pacet || 169d || Ah.6.39.169v/ 39-169av gāyatrī-śikhi-śiṃśipāsana-śivā-vellākṣakāruṣkaraṃ 39-169bv piṣṭvāṣṭā-daśa-saṅguṇe 'mbhasi dhṛtān khaṇḍaiḥ sahāyo-malaiḥ 39-169bv piṣṭvāṣṭā-daśa-saṅguṇe 'mbhasi dhṛtaṃ khaṇḍaiḥ sahāyo-mayaiḥ 39-169bv piṣṭvāṣṭau daśa-ṣaḍ-guṇe 'mbhasi dhṛtaṃ khaṇḍaiḥ sahāyo-mayaiḥ 39-169cv pātre loha-kṛte try-ahaṃ ravi-karair āloḍayan pācayed
pūtasyāṃśaḥ kṣīrato 'ṃśas tathāṃśau bhārgān niryāsād dvau varāyās trayo 'ṃśāḥ |
aṃśāś catvāraś ceha haiyaṅgavīnād ekī-kṛtyaitat sādhayet kṛṣṇa-lauhe || 170 || Ah.6.39.170v/ 39-170bv bhārgī-niryāsād dvau varāyās trayo 'ṃśāḥ 39-170cv aṃśāś catvāraś caiva haiyaṅgavīnād
vi-mala-khaṇḍa-sitā-madhubhiḥ pṛthag yutam a-yuktam idaṃ yadi vā ghṛtam |
sva-ruci-bhojana-pāna-viceṣṭito bhavati nā pala-śaḥ pariśīlayan || 171 || Ah.6.39.171v/ 39-171av vi-malayā sitayā madhunātha-vā 39-171dv bhavati nā pala-śaḥ pariśīlayet

dhatte 'sau nārasiṃhaṃ vapur anala-śikhā-tapta-cāmīkarābham || 172d || Ah.6.39.172v/ 39-172bv keśair bhṛṅgāti-nīlair madhu-surabhi-mukho naika-yoṣin-niṣevī 39-172cv vāṅ-medhāvī samṛddhaḥ su-paṭu-huta-vaho māsa-mātropayogād
attāraṃ nārasiṃhasya vyādhayo na spṛśanty api |
cakrojjvala-bhujaṃ bhītā nārasiṃham ivāsurāḥ || 173 || Ah.6.39.173v/ 39-173cv cakrojjvala-bhujā bhītā
bhṛṅga-pravālān amunaiva bhṛṣṭān ghṛtena yaḥ khādati yantritātmā |
gṛhṇāti sakṛd apy uktam a-vilupta-smṛtīndriyaḥ || 175 || Ah.6.39.175v/ 39-175bv jīvaty abda-śata-dvayam
anenaiva ca kalpena yas tailam upayojayet |
tān evāpnoti sa guṇān kṛṣṇa-keśaś ca jāyate || 176 ||
mahānuśaṃsāny api cāparāṇi prāpty-ādi-kaṣṭāni na kīrtitāni || 177 || Ah.6.39.177v/ 39-177cv mahānubhāvāny api cāparāṇi 39-177cv mahānuśaṃsyāny api cāparāṇi
yathā-svam auṣadhaṃ teṣāṃ kāryaṃ muktvā rasāyanam || 178 ||
guṇair ebhiḥ samuditaḥ sevate yo rasāyanam |
sa nivṛttātmā dīrghāyuḥ para-treha ca modate || 180 || Ah.6.39.180v/ 39-180av guṇair etaiḥ samuditaiḥ 39-180cv sa nirvṛtātmā dīrghāyuḥ
tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭir apatyaṃ ca guṇa-vat tatra saṃśritam || 1 ||
tad vājī-karaṇaṃ tad dhi dehasyorjas-karaṃ param || 3 || Ah.6.40.003v/ 40-3dv dehasyaujas-karaṃ param
anumodāmahe brahma-caryam ekānta-nirmalam || 4 || Ah.6.40.004v/ 40-4av dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ 40-4bv loka-dvaya-sukhāvaham 40-4bv loka-dvaya-hitāvaham
śarīra-kṣaya-rakṣārthaṃ vājī-karaṇam ucyate || 5 || Ah.6.40.005v/ 40-5av alpa-sat-tvasya ca kleśair 40-5av alpa-sat-tvasya cotkleśair 40-5bv bādhyamānasya rogiṇaḥ
sarveṣv ṛtuṣv ahar ahar vyavāyo na nivāryate || 6 || Ah.6.40.006v/ 40-6av kalpasyodagra-vayaso
tato vājī-karān yogān śukrāpatya-bala-pradān || 8 || Ah.6.40.008v/ 40-8dv śukrāpatya-vivardhanān
yathaikaś caika-śākhaś ca nir-apatyas tathā naraḥ || 9 ||

kiṃ punar yad yaśo-dharma-māna-śrī-kula-vardhanam || 11 || Ah.6.40.011v/ 40-11av apatyaṃ tulya-tā kena 40-11cv kiṃ punar yo yaśo-dharma- 40-11dv -māna-śrī-kula-vardhanaḥ 40-11dv -māna-śrī-kula-vardhanāt
śarekṣu-kuśa-kāśānāṃ vidāryā vīraṇasya ca || 12 || Ah.6.40.012v/ 40-12av śuddhe kāye yathā-śakti
mede dve dve ca kākolyau śūrpaparṇyau śatāvarīm || 13 ||
vīrāṃ payasyāṃ jīvantīm ṛddhiṃ rāsnāṃ trikaṇṭakam || 14 ||
madhukaṃ śāliparṇīṃ ca bhāgāṃs tri-palikān pṛthak |
māṣāṇām āḍhakaṃ caitad dvi-droṇe sādhayed apām || 15 ||
vīrāṃ svaguptāṃ kākolyau yaṣṭīṃ phalgūni pippalīm || 17 || Ah.6.40.017v/ 40-17dv yaṣṭikaṃ gaja-pippalīm
tat siddha-pūtaṃ cūrṇasya pṛthak prasthena yojayet || 18 ||
śarkarāyās tugāyāś ca pippalyāḥ kuḍavena ca |
pala-mātraṃ tataḥ khādet praty-ahaṃ rasa-dugdha-bhuk || 20 || Ah.6.40.020v/ 40-20bv kṣaudrād dvi-kuḍavena ca 40-20dv praty-ahaṃ madhu-dugdha-bhuk
pṛthak svaguptā-mūlāc ca kuḍavāṃśaṃ tathā madhu |
so 'kṣa-mātram ataḥ khādet yasya rāmā-śataṃ gṛhe |
sātmaguptā-phalān kṣīre godhūmān sādhitān himān || 23 || Ah.6.40.023v/ 40-23bv yasya kāntā-śataṃ gṛhe
jāgarti rātriṃ sakalām a-khinnaḥ khedayan striyaḥ || 24 ||
yaḥ khādet sa-sitān gacchet sa strī-śatam a-pūrva-vat || 25 || Ah.6.40.025v/ 40-25bv bhāvitān bahu-śas tilān
kṣaudra-sarpir-yutaṃ līḍhvā pramadā-śatam ṛcchati || 26 || Ah.6.40.026v/ 40-26dv pramadā daśa gacchati
śarkarā-madhu-sarpirbhir līḍhvā yo 'nu payaḥ pibet || 27 || Ah.6.40.027v/ 40-27av kṛṣṇa-dhātrī-phala-rajaḥ
payo-'nu-pānaṃ yo lihyān nitya-vegaḥ sa nā bhavet |
kulīraśṛṅgyā yaḥ kalkam āloḍya payasā pibet || 29 ||
pibed bāṣkayaṇaṃ cānu kṣīraṃ na kṣayam eti saḥ |
svayaṅguptekṣurakayor bīja-cūrṇaṃ sa-śarkaram || 31 || Ah.6.40.031v/ 40-31av pibed bāṣkayiṇaṃ cānu
uccaṭā-cūrṇam apy evaṃ śatāvaryāś ca yojayet || 32 ||
paṭe su-mārjitaṃ bhuktvā vṛddho 'pi taruṇāyate || 33 || Ah.6.40.033v/ 40-33cc paṭe su-bhāvitaṃ bhuktvā
piban kṣīreṇa jīrṇo 'pi gacchati pramadā-śatam || 34 || Ah.6.40.034v/ 40-34cv pibet kṣīreṇa jīrṇo 'pi
yat kiñ-cin madhuraṃ snigdhaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ bala-vardhanam |
manaso harṣaṇaṃ yac ca tat sarvaṃ vṛṣyam ucyate || 35 ||
dravyair evaṃ-vidhais tasmād darpitaḥ pramadāṃ vrajet |
ātma-vegena codīrṇaḥ strī-guṇaiś ca praharṣitaḥ || 36 || Ah.6.40.036v/ 40-36bv bhāvitaḥ pramadāṃ vrajet
viṣayātiśayāḥ pañca śarāḥ kusuma-dhanvanaḥ || 37 || Ah.6.40.037v/ 40-37dv śarāḥ kusuma-dhanvinaḥ
iṣṭā hy ekaika-śo 'py arthā harṣa-prīti-karāḥ param |
kiṃ punaḥ strī-śarīre ye saṅghātena pratiṣṭhitāḥ || 38 || Ah.6.40.038v/ 40-38cv kiṃ punaḥ strī-śarīreṣu
nāmāpi yasyā hṛdayotsavāya yāṃ paśyatāṃ tṛptir an-āpta-pūrvā |
sarvendriyākarṣaṇa-pāśa-bhūtā kāntānuvṛtti-vrata-dīkṣitā yā || 39 || Ah.6.40.039v/ 40-39bv yāṃ paśyatas tṛptir an-āpta-pūrvā
priyaṃ-vadā tulya-manaḥ-śayā yā sā strī vṛṣya-tvāya paraṃ narasya || 40 || Ah.6.40.040v/ 40-40cv priyaṃ-vadā tulya-manaḥ-sva-bhāvā
ācarec ca sakalāṃ rati-caryāṃ kāma-sūtra-vihitām an-a-vadyām |
gāndharva-kāvyādi-kathā-pravīṇāḥ sama-sva-bhāvā vaśa-gā vayasyāḥ || 42 || Ah.6.40.042v/ 40-42bv -srag-anna-vastrābharaṇa-prakārāḥ 40-42cv gandharva-kanyādi-kathā-pravīṇāḥ
nīla-sānu-giri-kūṭa-nitambe kānanāni pura-kaṇṭha-gatāni || 43 || Ah.6.40.043v/ 40-43av dīrghikāḥ sva-bhavanānta-niviṣṭāḥ 40-43bv padma-reṇu-madhu-matta-vihaṅgāḥ 40-43cv nīla-sānu-giri-kūṭa-nitambāḥ
aṅga-sukhartu-vaśena vibhūṣā citta-sukhaḥ sakalaḥ parivāraḥ || 44 || Ah.6.40.044v/ 40-44bv śrotra-sukhāḥ kala-kokila-nādāḥ 40-44cv aṅga-sukhartu viśeṣa-vibhūṣā
tāmbūlam accha-madirā kāntā kāntā niśā śaśāṅkāṅkā |
yad yac ca kiñ-cid iṣṭaṃ manaso vājī-karaṃ tat tat || 45 || Ah.6.40.045v/ 40-45bv kāntāḥ kāntā niśāḥ śaśāṅkāṅkāḥ 40-45dv manaso vājī-karaṃ hi tat
madhu mukham iva sotpalaṃ priyāyāḥ kala-raṇanā parivādinī priyeva |
kusuma-caya-mano-ramā ca śayyā kisalayinī latikeva puṣpitāgrā || 46 || Ah.6.40.046v/ 40-46bv kala-raṇanā priya-vādinī priyeva 40-46cv kusuma-caya-mano-harā ca śayyā
deśe śarīre ca na kā-cid artir artheṣu nālpo 'pi mano-vidhānaḥ |
vājī-karāḥ sannihitāś ca yogāḥ kāmasya kāmaṃ paripūrayanti || 47 || Ah.6.40.047v/ 40-47av deśe śarīre na kadā-cid artir 40-47bv artheṣu nālpo 'pi mano-'bhighātaḥ
mustā parpaṭakaṃ jvare tṛṣi jalaṃ mṛd-bhṛṣṭa-loṣṭodbhavaṃ || 48a ||
lājāś chardiṣu vasti-jeṣu girijaṃ meheṣu dhātrī-niśe || 48b ||
sandhāne kṛmijā viṣe śukatarur medo-'nile gugguluḥ || 48d ||
sthūleṣu tārkṣyaṃ kṛmiṣu kṛmighnaṃ śoṣe surā chāga-payo 'tha māṃsam || 49 || Ah.6.40.049v/ 40-49bv bhallātam arśaḥsu gareṣu hema
akṣy-āmayeṣu tri-phalā guḍūcī vātāsra-roge mathitaṃ grahaṇyām |
kuṣṭheṣu sevyaḥ khadirasya sāraḥ sarveṣu rogeṣu śilāhvayaṃ ca || 50 ||
unmādaṃ ghṛtam a-navaṃ śokaṃ madyaṃ vyapasmṛtiṃ brāhmī |
nidrā-nāśaṃ kṣīraṃ jayati rasālā pratiśyāyam || 51 || Ah.6.40.051v/ 40-51bv śokaṃ madyaṃ visaṃsmṛtiṃ brāhmī
māṃsaṃ kārśyaṃ laśunaḥ prabhañjanaṃ stabdha-gātra-tāṃ svedaḥ |
guḍamañjaryāḥ khapuro nasyāt skandhāṃsa-bāhu-rujam || 52 || Ah.6.40.052v/ 40-52dv nasyaṃ skandhāṃsa-bāhu-rujam
nava-nīta-khaṇḍa-marditam auṣṭraṃ mūtraṃ payaś ca hanty udaram |
nasyaṃ mūrdha-vikārān vidradhim a-cirotthitam asra-visrāvaḥ || 53 || Ah.6.40.053v/ 40-53bv auṣṭrī-mūtraṃ payaś ca hanty udaram 40-53cv nasyaṃ cordhva-vikārān 40-53cv nasyaṃ mūrdhni vikārān
vṛddhasya kṣīra-ghṛte mūrchāṃ śītāmbu-māruta-cchāyāḥ || 54 || Ah.6.40.054v/ 40-54av nasyaṃ kavaḍaṃ mukha-gadān 40-54av nasyaṃ kevalaṃ mukha-gadān 40-54av nasyaṃ kavaḍaṃ mukha-jān
sama-śuktārdraka-mātrā mande vahnau śrame surā snānam |

duḥkha-saha-tve sthairye vyāyāmo gokṣurur hitaḥ kṛcchre || 55 || Ah.6.40.055v/ 40-55av sama-śuṣkārdraka-mātrā 40-55bv mande vahnau śrame surā-pānam 40-55cv duḥkha-saha-tvaṃ sthairye 40-55cv duḥkha-saha-tvaṃ sthaulye
vayasaḥ sthāpane dhātrī tri-phalā guggulur vraṇe || 56 || Ah.6.40.056v/ 40-56av kāse nidigdhikā-pānaṃ 40-56bv pārśva-śūle ca pauṣkaram 40-56cv vayaḥ-saṃsthāpane dhātrī
vastir vāta-vikārān paittān rekaḥ kaphodbhavān vamanam |
kṣaudraṃ jayati balāsaṃ sarpiḥ pittaṃ samīraṇaṃ tailam || 57 ||
ity agryaṃ yat proktaṃ rogāṇām auṣadhaṃ śamāyālam |
ity ātreyād āgamayyārtha-sūtraṃ tat-sūktānāṃ peśalānām a-tṛptaḥ |

bheḍādīnāṃ sammato bhakti-namraḥ papracchedaṃ saṃśayāno 'gniveśaḥ || 59 || Ah.6.40.059v/ 40-59av ity ātreyād āgamād ārtha-sūkṣmaṃ 40-59av ity ātreyād āgamayyārtha-sūkṣmaṃ 40-59bv tat-sūktīnāṃ peśalānām a-tṛptaḥ
kiṃ śāsti śāstram asmin iti kalpayato 'gniveśa-mukhyasya |
śiṣya-gaṇasya punarvasur ācakhyau kārtsnyatas tat-tvam || 62 || Ah.6.40.062v/ 40-62dv ācakṣe kārtsnyatas tat-tvam
na cikitsā-cikitsā ca tulyā bhavitum arhati |
jīvitaṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ sarveṣām eva nauṣadhāt || 64 || Ah.6.40.064v/ 40-64dv sarveṣām eva nauṣadham
na hy upāyam apekṣante sarve rogā na cānya-thā |
upāya-sādhyāḥ sidhyanti nā-hetur hetu-mān yataḥ || 65 || Ah.6.40.065v/ 40-65dv no '-hetur hetu-māṃs tataḥ
mṛtyur bhavati tan naivaṃ nopāye 'sty an-upāya-tā || 66 || Ah.6.40.066v/ 40-66dv nopāyeṣv an-upāya-tā
api copāya-yuktasya dhī-mato jātu cit kriyā |
na sidhyed daiva-vaiguṇyān na tv iyaṃ ṣo-ḍaśātmikā || 67 || Ah.6.40.067v/ 40-67av apy evopāya-yuktasya 40-67cv na siddhir daiva-vaiguṇyān 40-67dv na nv iyaṃ ṣo-ḍaśātmikā
na prīṇanaṃ karṣaṇaṃ vā kasya kṣīraṃ gavedhukam || 68 || Ah.6.40.068v/ 40-68cv na prīṇanaṃ karśanaṃ vā 40-68dv kasya kṣīra-gavedhukam
viṇ-mūtra-karaṇākṣepau kasya saṃśayitau yave || 69 || Ah.6.40.069v/ 40-69av kasya māṣātmaguptādyair 40-69bv vṛṣa-tve nāsti niścayaḥ
kaḥ prāptaḥ kalya-tāṃ pathyād ṛte rohiṇikādiṣu || 70 || Ah.6.40.070v/ 40-70cv kaḥ prāptaḥ kalpa-tāṃ pathyād
śāstrād eva gataṃ siddhiṃ jvare laṅghana-bṛṃhaṇam || 72 ||
mā kṛthā vyādhi-nirghātaṃ vicikitsāṃ cikitsite || 73 || Ah.6.40.073v/ 40-73av catuṣ-pād-guṇa-sampūrṇe 40-73cv mā kṛthā vyādhi-nirghāte
etad dhi mṛtyu-pāśānām a-kāṇḍe chedanaṃ dṛḍham |
yāti hālāhala-tvaṃ tu sadyo dur-bhājana-sthitam || 75 || Ah.6.40.075v/ 40-75av etad vedāmṛtaṃ sākṣāj 40-75bv jagaty āyāsa-varjitam 40-75cv yāti hālāhala-tvaṃ ca
tyajed dūrād bhiṣak-pāśān pāśān vaivasvatān iva || 76 || Ah.6.40.076v/ 40-76cv vivarjayed bhiṣak-pāśān
abhyasta-karmaṇāṃ bhadraṃ bhadraṃ bhadrābhilāṣiṇām || 77 || Ah.6.40.077v/ 40-77bv bahu-dhāgama-śālinām 40-77bv bhadram āgama-śīlinām 40-77cv abhyasta-karmaṇāṃ siddhir
cikitsā-śāstram a-khilaṃ vyāpya yat paritaḥ sthitam || 78 || Ah.6.40.078v/ 40-78bv tantra-doṣa-vivarjitam 40-78dv vyāpaṭhya paritaḥ sthitam

mahā-sāgara-gambhīra-saṅgrahārthopalakṣaṇam || 79 || Ah.6.40.079v/ 40-79av vipulā-mala-vijñānaṃ 40-79cv mahā-sāgara-gambhīraṃ 40-79cv mahā-muni-matānugam 40-79dv saṅgrahārthopalakṣaṇam 40-79dv saṅgrahārthopalakṣakam

tasmād an-alpa-phalam alpa-samudyamānāṃ prīty-artham etad uditaṃ pṛthag eva tantram || 80 || Ah.6.40.080v/ 40-80bv yo 'ṣṭāṅga-saṅgraha-mahāmṛta-sāra-tulyaḥ 40-80dv prīty-artham evam uditaṃ pṛthag eva tantram
mantra-vat samprayoktavyaṃ na mīmāṃsyaṃ kathañ-ca-na || 81 || Ah.6.40.081v/ 40-81av idam āgama-śuddha-tvāt 40-81dv na mīmāṃsyaṃ kadā-ca-na
dīrgha-jīvitam ārogyaṃ dharmam arthaṃ sukhaṃ yaśaḥ |
pāṭhāvabodhānuṣṭhānair adhigacchaty ato dhruvam || 82 || Ah.6.40.082v/ 40-82av dīrghaṃ jīvitam ārogyaṃ
etat paṭhan saṅgraha-bodha-śaktaḥ sv-abhyasta-karmā bhiṣag a-prakampyaḥ |
ākampayaty anya-viśāla-tantra-kṛtābhiyogān yadi tan na citram || 83 || Ah.6.40.083v/ 40-83cv yaḥ kampayaty anya-viśāla-tantra-
yadi carakam adhīte tad dhruvaṃ suśrutādi-praṇigadita-gadānāṃ nāma-mātre 'pi bāhyaḥ |

atha caraka-vihīnaḥ prakriyāyām a-klinnaḥ kim iva khalu karotu vyādhitānāṃ varākaḥ || 84 || Ah.6.40.084v/ 40-84bv -praṇigadita-gadānāṃ nāma-mātreṇa bāhyaḥ 40-84bv -pratigadita-gadānāṃ nāma-mātre 'pi bāhyaḥ 40-84dv kim iha khalu karotu vyādhitānāṃ varākaḥ
abhiniveśa-vaśād abhiyujyate su-bhaṇite 'pi na yo dṛḍha-mūḍhakaḥ |
paṭhatu yatna-paraḥ puruṣāyuṣaṃ sa khalu vaidyakam ādyam a-nirvidaḥ || 85 ||
vāte pitte śleṣma-śāntau ca pathyaṃ tailaṃ sarpir mākṣikaṃ ca krameṇa |
etad brahmā bhāṣatāṃ brahma-jo vā kā nir-mantre vaktṛ-bhedokti-śaktiḥ || 86 || Ah.6.40.086v/ 40-86cv etad brahmā bhāṣate brahma-jo vā
ato matsaram utsṛjya mādhyasthyam avalambyatām || 87 || Ah.6.40.087v/ 40-87av abhidhātur vaśāt kiñ-cid
bheḍādyāḥ kiṃ na paṭhyante tasmād grāhyaṃ su-bhāṣitam || 88 ||
kṛtvā yac chubham āptaṃ śubham astu paraṃ tato jagataḥ || 89 ||
